title: Semolina Cake
ingredients: ['125g plain flour', '4 tablespoons semolina', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '350g butter', '150g caster sugar', '10 eggs, separated', '125ml orange juice', '2 tablespoons grated orange zest', '1 dessertspoon vanilla extract', '2 tablespoons brandy', '100g almonds, coarsely chopped', '100g almonds, finely chopped', '50g flaked almonds', '1 tablespoon brandy (optional)']
